name: Routine (itch) (corpsepile)
description:
[6:00 A.M.] Wake Up
[9:00 P.M.] Relax
[6:00 A.M.] Wake Up

Routine is a very short, narrative experiment (with light horror themes) about regiments, patience, and what it means to end.
